user.title: Dell iDRAC Integration Setup
user.description: Configure your Dell iDRAC connection. Choose the connection method that best fits your needs.

data_description.host: The IP address or hostname of your Dell iDRAC
data_description.connection_type:
How to connect to your iDRAC:
• **Redfish**: Full featured with moderate performance
• **SNMP**: Fast performance, monitoring only
• **Hybrid**: Best of both - SNMP speed with Redfish controls
data_description.scan_interval: How often to refresh sensor data (10-300 seconds)

redfish.title: Redfish API Configuration
redfish.description: Configure Redfish API connection for {host}. This provides full control features including LED control and system resets.

data_description.verify_ssl: Enable SSL certificate verification (usually disabled for iDRACs)
data_description.request_timeout: Timeout for individual API requests (5-120 seconds)
data_description.session_timeout: Timeout for the entire session (10-180 seconds)

snmp.title: SNMP Configuration
snmp.description: Configure SNMP connection for {host}. This provides fast monitoring of sensors but no control features.

data_description.snmp_version: SNMP protocol version (v2c for simple, v3 for secure)
data_description.community: SNMP community string (only for v2c, usually 'public')
data_description.auth_protocol: SNMP v3 authentication method (only for v3)
data_description.auth_password: SNMP v3 authentication password (only for v3)
data_description.priv_protocol: SNMP v3 encryption method (only for v3)
data_description.priv_password: SNMP v3 encryption password (only for v3)

hybrid_redfish.title: Hybrid Mode - Redfish Controls

data_description.session_timeout: Session timeout for control operations (10-180 seconds)

data_description.snmp_version: SNMP protocol version (v2c for simple, v3 for secure)
data_description.community: SNMP community string (only for v2c, usually 'public')
data_description.auth_protocol: SNMP v3 authentication method (only for v3)
data_description.auth_password: SNMP v3 authentication password (only for v3)
data_description.priv_protocol: SNMP v3 encryption method (only for v3)
data_description.priv_password: SNMP v3 encryption password (only for v3)
